game.name: JR EAST Train Simulator
game.categories: Single-player, Full controller support, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: The official train company's authentic driving simulator is here! JR East Train Simulator" is a train driving simulator that allows you to experience live-action images and realistic driving sounds of JR East's actual train lines in your own home.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The official train company's authentic driving simulator is here! JR East Train Simulator" is a train driving simulator that allows you to experience live-action images and realistic driving sounds of JR East's actual train lines in your own home.

reviewHighlights.text: The BASIC paid version should have at least 1 single complete route so we can enjoy the train sim but NOT what I expected. The BASIC version is pretty...
